subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] An alternative to the usual ghost hunter stuff.
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_005E_01C9BA0B.43D970A0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

When it comes to the Ouija, I just want to study it to find out if it is re=
ally spirit communication, or just kinetic energy or your subconscious mind=
 moving the planchette.

I agree that we all have the ability for extra sen=
sory perception, just some are better at it than others. Like running, for =
instance. We all can run, but some are naturally better at it. Still, with =
practice we can get better.

But that is not my aim with the Ouija.


  ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
  From: lori bogren 
  To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.c=
om 
  Sent: Friday, April 10, 2009 6:11 PM
  Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] An alte=
rnative to the usual ghost hunter stuff.





  April~
   
  You forgot yaw=
n from boredom, that's what I do.
   
  Use it, don't use it.  I don't care=
.  But why bother.  When people ask me I usually suggest that if they want =
to communicate with ... whatever why not develop the ability yourself.  - y=
a, I'm one of those who believe anyone can.
   
  There's always the questi=
on in the back of your mind whether your partner's moving it.  The intentio=
ns of "what" you are talking to.  Not to mention it's too slow and limited.=

   
  Besides if you take the time to develop the ability you can get more=
 texture in the information.  Asking the board "where you married?" may get=
 you a "yes" but a psychic might get the sense of a religious or civil cere=
monhy, the garment(s) worn, other's in the party, or whether that Being app=
roved/disapproved of their spouse (ie was it a reluctant union).
   
  ~Lor=
i



  "My life is boring, my fantasies are a theme park." 
  --Anne Rice  =
Responding to an interviewer who just did not get it. 

    




----------=
--------------------------------------------------------------------
  To: =
EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
  From: april@...
  Date: =
Fri, 10 Apr 2009 08:32:45 -0600
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] An alternative to =
the usual ghost hunter stuff.


  .
  Yeah-that's the problem with it I hav=
e found too. Most people, when you mention Ouija, either run screaming, or =
bring up religion.

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Frank Sumpt=
ion 
    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, April 10, 2009 8:26=
 AM
    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] An alternative to the usual ghost hunter stu=
ff.


    Yeah, it's a boards --board--hehe. Naw just checking out differen=
t stuff, but mostly it's alot of newagy stuff. 

     F-S

ver Hotmail=AE: Get e-mail storage that grows with you. Check it out.
